item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: DIS (The Walt Disney Company) Mega The battle with activist investors is won, but the pressure on Bob Iger will persist, and Disney needs to focus on succession planning, cost-cutting, and revenue growth. NOV (NOV Inc.) Small NOV Inc. presents potential value for shareholders through dividend payments and positive financial performance, but its recent stock performance and projected fair value indicate market volatility and potential risks.
